name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹精密機電系統之基本架構包括機械系統(如機架、基礎、導程與軸承、動力傳遞系統等)及控制系統(如製程控制、數值控制、幾何資料處理、進給驅動器、位置量測系統、機器監視與診斷等)，探討先進精密機電系統(如工具機、機器人、FMS、CIM、微機電系統等)。
description.en: This course will give an introduction to basic components of the precision mechatronic system including mechanical systems (e.g. machine frame, machine foundation, bearings and guides, power transmission etc.) and control systems (e.g. process control, numerical control, geometric data processing, driving systems, position measurement system, automatic manufacturing monitoring and diagnostics, etc. ). Studies of advanced precision mechatronic systems including machine tools, robotics, FMS, CIM , micro- electro- mechanical systems (MEMS) and so on.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目、在教授的個別指導下、 進行實驗研究、並將研究結果寫成報告。
description.en: The topic of the special project is discussed and together by the students and the advisor. Under the face-to-face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。此課程對製造、設計、動力組甚為重要。內容有：流體靜壓、動壓及熱力學基本觀念、氣液壓傳動元件之靜、動態特性、氣液壓傳動元與機動間之關係、氣液壓傳動元與電腦控制、氣液壓技術實例。
description.en: Review of Fluid Static, Dynamics and Thermodynamics, Static and Dynamic Characteristics of Fluid Transmission Components and System, Computer-Control Fluid Power Systems, Case Study.

name.zh: 塑膠射出模具CAE模流分析
name.en: Mold-flow analysis of plastic injection mold CAE

description.zh:
(1) 瞭解CAE網格概念與建構，將以國內開發的模流分析軟體Moldex-3D作為教學實
       習的內容：(2)流動分析，即熔膠充填狀態；(3)保壓分析，分析模內壓力分佈狀態；(4)
       冷卻分析，關於模內溫度分佈；(5)翹曲分析，分析成形品的變形。
description.en: (1) To realize mesh concept and construct the mesh. (2) Flow analysis of melt plastic filling. (3) Packing analysis of pressure distribution in the mold. (4) Cooling analysis of temperature distribution in the mold. (5) Warp analysis of injection molding parts.

notes: 機械四甲與最後一哩合開，限30人

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

notes: 碩士班畢業門檻,限碩班學生修

description.zh: 先修課程：3002011或負責教授同意。基本觀念及其領域、非線性代數之數值解法、聯立方程式之數值解、多項式內外插、微分、積分、常微分方程、起始與邊界值問題之數值解法。
description.en: 1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the numerical method 2. Numerical methods of solving nonlinear algebraic equations. 3. Numerical methods of solving systems of linear equations. 4. Numerical interpolation and extrapolation. 5. Numerical differentiation and integration.6. Numerical methods of ordinary differential equations with initial-value problems and boundary value problems.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程讓學生熟悉機電系統之整合技術與設計(如機電介面之原理、機械系統、感測與致動之原理及其元件、自動控制技術等)。實務製作以分組方式實施，內容包括PC及DSP微處理器控制之倒單擺平衡系統、熱爐箱溫度控制、或自走機器人設計與控制等。
description.en: The course contains technology and design of mechatronic system. For example: interface principle, mechanical system design, sensor and actuator device, and automatic control, etc. Hands-on experiments are carried out by team work and may include PC-based and microprocessor-based control of inverted pendulum system, oven temperature control, or mobile robot design and control.

notes: 分兩時段：一 234 和 三 234

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目、在教授的個別指導下、 進行實驗研究、並將研究結果寫成報告。

description.zh: 指導學生進行研究專題，以培育其實務的能力，學生必須選定一實務專題，由本系教師指導，在畢業前完成成品製作，且須有書面報告。
description.en: Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instrution's instructions to select the topics of  special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.

description.zh: 配電系統規劃及自動化，負載特性，配電變壓器的應用，二次輸電線及配電站設計，一次系統的設計考慮，二次系統的設計考慮，電壓降落及電力損失計算，電容器在配電系統上的應用，配電系統電壓調整，配電系統負載潮流分析，配電系統故障分析。
description.en:
Course Title:Industrial power distribution Labs.
Description:To familiarize students with the techniques of analyzing,
designing, operating, maintaining high and low voltage power
distribution systems.

description.zh: 各種時域響應之電腦繪圖，矩陣各項特性分析與應用，根值軌跡圖，波德圖，奈奎士圖，PID控制器之設計，Lead-Lag補償器之設計，控制器時域及頻域分析，控制器在狀態空間之設計，實例探討，書報研讀。
description.en:
Course Title:Automatic Control Practice
Description:This course is first to introduce the basic concepts of
control systems and the mathematical background, second, state the
transfer function, block diagram and signal  flow graph, third,
discuss the mathematical modeling of control systems and elements, and
forth, describe the time-domain analysis, root locus techniques and
frequency-domain of control systems, and then to measure the character
of control systems, Finally, the design of control system will be
introduced.

description.zh:
1.空間描述與數學轉換
2.機械手臂運動學
3.機械手臂反向運動學
4.賈氏矩陣
5.軌跡規劃
6.機械手臂之線性控制
7.機器人視覺
8.機器人避障
9.工業自動化應用
10.實驗項目：機械手臂及機器人操控、結合視覺感測之機械手臂自動化系統、機器人導航與控制
description.en:
1.Spatial description transformation 
2.Manipulation kinematics 
3.Inverse manipulation kinematics 
4.Jacobians 
5.Trajectory generation
6.Linear control of manipulator 
7.Machine vision 
8.Robotic obstacle avoidance 
9.Industrial automation applications 
10.Laboratory work: control of manipulators and mobile robots, automatic manipulation with vision sensors, navigation and control of mobile robots

notes: 四電四甲乙丙合開,限21人

description.zh: 本課程以化工程序中所包含的製程如蒸餾、熱交換器、攪拌、泵、機械分離等，由質量、能量及動量均衡開始講述，然後探討程序設計時使用的流程圖及其符號、成本估算、管線配置、流體輸送、化工單元規格設計等。
description.en:
Application of chemical engineering science techniques to design of chemical processes. Comprehensive problems are assigned which include heat, material and economic balances, unit operations and processes, kinetics and thermodynamics.
The major responsibility is placed on individuals or small groups for the optimum design and selection of equipment, and for the calculations of required sizes, plant layout, and cost analyses.

description.zh: 藉理論基礎配合儀器設備，使學生知道微電腦之應用，並以電腦來控制流量、溫度、PH值等動態模擬。
description.en: By the use of flow rate control instrument, temperature control instrument, liquid level control instrument and pressure control instrument, students study the applicability of basic control theory.

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms.

name.zh: 單元操作與輸送現象(四)

description.zh: 本課程內容包括質傳應用、粉粒體操作單元。
description.en: This course contents mass transfer application and operations involving particulate solids.

description.zh: 讓學生學習文獻之蒐集方法與整理，以便瞭解學術論文製作方式，培養學生獨立自主探討一個理論或技術上的問題，並經由實驗設計及資料之判讀更深入專業領域。
description.en: A course allows students collect and oranize literature information and them design their own experiments. An independent research capability can be developed through out this learning process.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程以化工程序中所包含的製程如蒸餾、熱交換器、攪拌、泵、機械分離等，由質量、能量及動量均衡開始講述，然後探討程序設計時使用的流程圖及其符號、成本估算、管線配置、流體輸送、化工單元規格設計等。

description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 使學生認識陶瓷製造的基本過程及測試陶瓷基本性質，包括陶瓷材料之物理，機械，及電導性質。除配合國內產業結構外，本實習課程將另介紹對新陶瓷的製程技術概念。
description.en: Let students understand the basic process of ceramics manufacturing and the fundamental property of testing ceramics, including the physical, mechanical and electricity conductivity property of ceramics material. Except for matching the domestic industry development structure, this laboratory course shall introduce the new manufacturing technique concept of new ceramics.

description.zh:
訓練學生獨立思考，培養學生對材料性質之認識及製造能力，專題
內容包括材料性質認識，材料保固技術訓練，材料表面處理，技術
培育等。學生必須研讀相關文獻後再研討專題實驗內容，並對實驗
及結果加以詳述，而完成學士論文報告。
description.en:
This course is trying to train independent thinking, to cultivate understanding
and manufacturing ability of material property for students, the content of
this subject includes the knowledge of material characteristics, the technique
training of material protection, the surface treatment, technique cultivation,
etc.. All the students must study related documents before they research
the subject-matter content, they have to make a detailed report to the
experiment and result at the final report.

description.zh: 本課程內容目的在介紹電化學之原理與其應用.一、在原理方面包括離子之作用及其平衡,電解質之導電性質,界面現象,電極電位,電化學電池和電極動力程序等內容.二、在應用方面則涵蓋溶液化學參數測量,電化學分析技術,電鍍,表面處理,金屬腐蝕防治,電池應用,和電合成等
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry and its applications. In the principles which includes ionic interaction, ionic equilibrium, the conducting properties of electrolytes, interfacial phenomena, electrode potentials, electrochemical cells and electrode kinetic process. For the application covers determination of physical parameters in the solutions, electroanalytical techniques, electroplating, electrochemical sensors, surface finishing, metal corrosion prevention, cells, electrodialysis, and electrosynthesis etc.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電子顯微鏡之結構，成像及繞射原理，以及在材料科學方面之應用，課程內容包括穿透式電子顯微鏡之構造，電磁透鏡與成像原理，電子繞射原理，繞射圖型分析，試片之製作方法。掃描式電子顯微鏡之構造及成像原理。EDS及WDS之X光光譜測量。
description.en:
The course introduces the structure of a electron microsope,the theories of forming 
image and diffraction, the applications of material science. The course contents include the transmission electron microscope structure,the electronic magnetic lens and image formation theory, electronic diffraction theory, diffraction diagram analysis, and the making of test sample, the structure and forming image principle of a scanning electron microscope, the X-ray spectrography of EDS and WDS.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

name.en: Special Topics on Mineral Resources Engineering (II)

description.zh: 有關資源工程之實務專題涵蓋資源開發、資源處理、工程地質、機能性礦物利用、資源回收等。
description.en: Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers.

description.zh: 此課程之目的為介紹一整體的鑽井與井完成作業，內容包括：油氣地質及岩石特性、油氣探勘方法、鑽機設備、鑽井技術、岩心取樣與分析、井測、岩層破碎、井壁處理及井完成作業。
description.en: English Description  Properties and occurrence of petroleum; petroleum exploration, equipment, materials, and processes employed in drilling and production practices; well completions; oil field operation.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程之內容設計主要是使學生在指導教授的教導下能實際去研究有關土木工程上的應用,從中學生能學習到解決土木上任何問題的方法.
description.en: This course is dsesigned to let the student works on any practice research of civil engineering under the guidence of adviser .From the procedure,students can learn the solution method of any practice problem of civil engineering.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹河川污染控制中有關河川污染源的種類及數量，就其分析模式中有關溶氧之來源、溶氧之消耗、非感潮河川與氧垂曲線模式之推演、河川調查及資料分析工作及河川涵容能力之計算方法亦有完整之敘說，藉由河川涵容能力之推估，達到控制或分配家庭污水及工業廢水之目的。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the River Pollution Control.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 學生與教授討論擬定之研究題目,在教授個別指導下,進行實驗之研究,以培養學生尋找相關資料,文獻及獨立研究的訓練,並將其研究成果撰寫成報告並公開發表練習。
description.en: To make students able to carry out independent study.  Students will be assigned a short topic.  An independent experimental design, data analysis, and final report presentation are necessary for this course.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在培養學生論文尋找及期刊選讀之能力，每位學生必須針對專一之問題尋找最近相關的資料。問題的認定，由老師協助資料之準備及口頭報告等是學生不可少的。且一學期至少須報告2次。學期成績將以學生在課堂上參與的態度及兩份書面資料決定。
description.en: This course is aimed at providing a training of review and paper studies for 4th grade students. Students are requested to search for the latest papers for a specific topic. Presentation and discussion are required for all attendants, twice persemester. The final score for a student will be determined based on students interaction in the class and two written reports.

description.zh:
無機化學係化學三大骨架之一，日常生活中之各樣物質大部分是由無機材料製成，課程係以深入淺出方式教授，授課內容涵蓋主族元素與過渡元素。課程內容包括:原理、主族元素化學、硼族、第1, 2, 15, 16, 17 族元素、過渡元素化學、
過渡元素、第一過渡系列元素、鈦,鉻,鈷,鎳,銅
description.en: Inorganic chemistry is one of the three frames of chemistry. Various materials in our daily life are composed of inorganic materials. This course will be given in a manner of easy-getting-point. The contents comprise of chemistry of main group elements and transition elements.  The course covers the following topics: (1) Survey of principles (2) Chemistry of main group elements (A. Boron; B. Group 1, 2, 15, 16, 17 Elements) (3) Chemistry of transition elements (A. Survey of Transition Elements; B. Elements of the first transition series; C. Titanium, Chromium, Cobalt, Nickel and Copper.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹1.新型的高分子合成方法，2.各類高科技高分子材料之合成探討。
description.en: This is a special course to elucidate advanced polymer synthesis and the discussion of the high-tech polymer materials.

description.zh: 本課程係探討纖維複合材料之製造原理及應用，其內容包括複合材料之樹脂製備，纖維系預浸材之製備﹔單軸向、雙軸向與三軸向複合材料之加工方法包括壓繞線成型，手積法，拉擠成型，擠壓法，力釜成型，真空袋技術，與編結成型法等，及複合材料機械與電氣性質等之量測方法及其終端用途。
description.en: The course is to interpret the principle of composites and its end application, which included resin preparation, fiber prepreg preparation, 1-D, 2-D, and 3-D composites processing methods are included. Such as filament winding, hand lay-up, molding compounds, autoclave and vacuum bag method, injection molding, compression molding, SMC, and BMC, pultrusion etc. are also included. Finally, mechanical and electrical properties of the composite and its end application are discussed in detail.

description.zh: 講述色彩、表色系統、測色、色彩容許度、色差、色彩管理和電腦配色之基本概念，以及介紹染色顏料的種類以及顏料粒子、結構與其色澤牢度之關係。
description.en: Description of the basic concept of color, color-order system, color measurement, color tolerance, color difference, color control and computer for color matching. On the other hand, It introduces all kinds of pigments available in the market currently and its relationship between the particle size and chemical structure with the properties and colour of pigments.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 1.簡介，2.數位影像處理的基礎，3.影像的轉換，4.影像的增強， 5.影像的復原，6.影像的壓縮，7.影像分割，8.影像的表達及描述，9. 自動車導航，及醫學影像的處理和應用，10.論文討論。

description.en: This course includes: ERP development history, global logistic strategy, ERP software and hardware infrastructures, and enterprise management intelligence system.

notes: 計網電腦教室，限40人；四工四甲乙合開

description.zh:
本課程介紹環境之物理及人因相關因素對人員生理及肌肉骨骼系統之影響。內容包括噪音與噪音防治、氣溫等大氣狀況、振動與加速度、環境照明、人體計測與工作/工作空間設計等相關內容。課程目的在使修課學生了解工業環境與作業負荷對於人員之影響，進而於職場建立有效之因應對策。使學生能夠
a. 瞭解工作場所主要人因工程危害因子(包括採光照明、噪音振動、極端溫濕環境、異常氣壓等物理因子及肌肉骨骼危害因子)、法規要求、量測/計算方法、評估與控制策略、以及相對應的預防措施。
b. 具有評估及分析工業環境物理性與肌肉骨骼危害因子及擬訂其控制及預防對策的能力。
description.en: This course introduces physical and musculoskeletal effects of various environmental and ergonomic factors on humans. Lectures cover topics of noise and noise control, environmental temperature, vibration and acceleration measurements, environmental illumination, and work design. This course aims to cultivate students to identify different types of ergonomic risk factors (e.g. luminance, extreme temperatures, abnormal pressure, noise, vibration, musculoskeletal hazards) that can present in the work environment and to learn the related regulation requirements, risk assessment tools, and hazard control strategies.

description.zh: 透過講課、討論、專題報告的方式，瞭解專案投資的擬定、決策分析、執行與評估方法，並探討不同因素對專案投資之影響，期提供良好的專案投資決策。
description.en: The objective of this course lies in definition of investment projects, investment decision-making, project execution and analysis methods. Various factors that affect the investment project decision problems are discussed to help decision maker properly resolves investment decision.

name.zh: 創新思維執行力實務應用
name.en: Practices and applications of TRIZ innovative thinking

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"突破創新"以增加競爭力之唯一生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地徹底執行它。不僅工程或服務技術要創新，管理思維更要突破創新，以有效迅速解?錯綜複雜的研發、工程與管理之諸多矛盾問題。本課程以創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)為基礎，詳細介紹工程技術如何落實創新與管理實務創新如何執行。本課程適用於自有品牌業者、ODM或OEM製造業者、服務業者與學術單位教學研究，特點如下:完整詳實闡述TRIZ理論並輔以大量簡單案例說明TRIZ概念、工程TRIZ實務案例10餘個與TRIZ工程與管理之參數與創新原則說明簡例約800餘個，管理實務案例20餘個，包含研發管理、服務業管理、專案管理與生產管理等。案例與簡例最多，創新執行力可快速上手與實施應用。本課程TRIZ研發、工程與管理兼顧，製造業與服務業高層、中層與基層員工皆符合讀者條件，使"突破創新"輕易實務執行並成為企業文化，亦適用於大學與研究所之工管、企管(經營管理)、工商管與工程相關科系，可自行按需求選擇性深入教授講解某些章節，也替產業界事先磨練一群創新思維之活力新血，可長久伴隨您在職場(或未來進入職場)解決研發、工程與管理之困難矛盾問題。
description.en: The aim of this course is to show how to implement TRIZ to resolve conflicts in Product R&D, engineering, and management tactic in a innovative thinking manner. TRIZ has been well-known as a creative and innovative thinking theory in solving engineering and technology contradictions in the last two decades. However, few studies and practical usage were proposed in Product R&D, management area. Nearly 30 real cases are discussed to demonstrate the ideas guided by TRIZ in product R&D management, engineering technology, Project management, Service industry management, and Production management. This course is able to pre-train a lot of students creative way and solve contradiction for further applications in real career.

notes: 四工四甲乙、工管所及最後一哩合開

description.zh: 資料和決策課程主要在介紹資訊和資料工程學，電腦推論的應用和企業決策管理等內容的設計的決策支援系統、資料抽離、資料採礦和智慧型的使用者－系統的合作系?。並利用電腦的使用來發現資料的型態，及其他任何類型的本文、影像或數字。其目的為幫助企業經理在不確定之情況下，瞭解資料和決策分析，作出較好的決定。
description.en:
Data and Decision course focuses on information and data engineering, computational reasoning applied, and enterprise decision management to the design of decision support systems, information extraction, data mining, and intelligent, adaptive user-system collaboration. It implements the use of computers to discover patterns in data, of any kind, text, images or numbers.
To develop an understanding of data and decision analysis to help managers make better decisions in the presence of uncertainty.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 以專題設計方式，訓練學生獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考，並實際演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組或獨自完成一設計主題。上學期課程以題目界定、資料收集、分析調查、結論定義、構想發展及草模提交等為教學內容，下學期則進行細部設計、模型製作、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容,以培養專業設計之能力。
description.en: Studio in product design for the senior. Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced products and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.

notes: 產品組(葉雯玓老師於設計603教室上課)

description.zh: 以專題設計方式，訓練學生獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考，並實際演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組或獨自完成一設計主題。上學期課程以題目界定、資料收集、分析調查、結論定義、構想發展及草模提交等為教學內容，下學期則進行細部設計、模型製作、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容,以培養專業設計之能力。

description.zh: 1. 藉其他專業知識的融入訓練學生具備深化建築實質環境的能力，兼顧實質設計手法與內涵。2. 訓練學生具備探討和發展設計議題，培養設計思考和評斷能力，並透過設計報告的撰寫，指導學生獨力發展與組織設計過程的能力。
description.en: With a specific design issue, in this course we explore the students' sensibility to our built environment. Students exercise a complete design process of a real project in two semesters, that they may touch more contexts in design thinking and practice more skills in architectural design.

description.zh: 本課主要以實例演練、訓練學生對施工圖樣、施工規範及施工實務之瞭解，並熟練數量計算及單價分析之方法及要點。主要授課內容含蓋：1.講授各項工程施工規範之標準、2.以實例訓練各項工程數量計算及單價分析：a.假設工程 b.安全措施工程 c.土方工程 d.混凝土工程 e.模板工程 f.鋼筋工程 g.磚牆工程 h.粉刷及裝修工程 i.雜項工程。
description.en:
The main purpose of this course is training students to comprehend the working drawings, the performance standards and the affairs of works by drilling actual example. This course makes students to be familiar with not only calculating the quantity but also the essentials and the methods in analyzing the unite price. The lesson's contents include: 
A.	To teach the standards of every performance standard. 
B.	To train calculating and analyzing the unite price of every work.
1.	Temporary work 
2.	Safety measure work 
3.	Earthwork
4.	Concrete work
5.	Mold work
6.	Reinforcement work
7.	Partition work
8.	Plaster, decoration and finish work
9.	Miscellaneous work

description.zh: 本課程採用分組教學，以1：5的師生比例就教師之專長指導學生在建築實務工作之各領域進行資料搜集，現場觀摩，對特定之課題提出報告，訓練學生深入的接觸並膫解實際的工作，以培養學生發掘問題，解決問題之執業能力。課程中間之暑假學生必須至事務所或工地現場實習，成果列為成績之一部分。
description.en: There are teaching groups for this course, each teacher by his particular research field direct five students in special topics on Architecture practice for information collecting, site studying, and report writing, The purpose is training students to come into conduct with reality Architecture working. Then, footer students professional ability to find problems, and resolve there problems in working field.On summer vocation period, students who take this course should do practice teaching in Architecture in Architecture office or working site, and the student performance for practice teaching will reueal to final grade.

description.zh: 本課程內容為介紹鋼構造建築物之基本特性，超高層鋼架及特殊空間鋼架之結構系統，使學生習得解決建築空間與結構型態之實務問題，其主要授課內容為：（1）鋼骨構架之特性，（2）於各種載重下鋼骨構材之行為，（3）鋼構架之變形能力與破壞機構，（4）超高層鋼架及特殊空間鋼架之結構系統，（5）消能裝置之特性及運用，（6）隔震、制震之現況及展望。
description.en: This course introduced the basic characteristics about steel structure, the structural systems and forms of hi-rise building and special indoor space, in order to provide students to learn the relation between architectural space and structural type, the course consists of (1)the characteristics of steel element,(2)behavior of steel element under variable loads,(3)deformation capacity and collapse mechanism of steel frame,(4)structural system of special indoor space,(5)the application and properties of energy dissipaters or mechanical dampers,(6)the view of base isolators and response control system of structures.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
先修課程:負責教授同意
自動控制概論，汽車自動變速簡介，液動基本原理，液體接合扭力變換器，行星齒輪與超速控制，自動閥控系統與換檔裝置，液壓油與液壓油之冷卻，電動自動變速簡介，各式變速箱舉例。
description.en:
Introduction to Automatic Control, Introduction to Automobile
Transmission, Hydraulic Principle, Hydraulic Coupling, Planetary Gears, Automatic Transmission Valve System, Hydraulic Oil Cooling System, Introduction to Electrical Transmission System.

description.zh:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
包括液滲檢測法、磁粉檢測法、放射線、超音波檢測法、中子射線、全像攝影檢測法等、針對各種檢測方法之原理、可靠度、靈敏度等作探討。
description.en: Liquid-Penetrant Examination, Magnetic Particle Examination, Radiographic Examination, Ultrasonic Examination, and other less common techniques. Physical Bases of Tests, Materials to which applicable, Calibration Standards, Reliability.

description.zh: 介紹台灣軌道車輛現況及未來、軌道車輛名詞、轉向架與懸吊系統、軌道與設施、車輛動態、輪軌界面、推進傳動與制動、行控號誌、大眾捷運系統、輕軌電車、高速鐵路、軌道公司參訪。
description.en: This course is a basic course of railroad vehicle system.  Topics will be mentioned: railroad vehicles in Taiwan, terminology, bogie and suspension systems, rail and construction, vehicle dynamics, wheel and rail, drive / transmission and brake, train control and communication, mass rapid transit system, light rail transit system, high speed rail transit system, and tours in railway company..

description.zh:
先修課程：負責教授同意．
肇事之形成因素，重建之定義及過程，數學物理及動力學應用於肇事重建，了解車輛碰撞行為，肇事之理解認知及反應，肇事之動量功能原理應用．車速估算．及轉向過度修正，轎車．機車．行人．及卡車肇事重建．
description.en: Causes & Contributing Factor in traffic accident, Process of Traffic Accidetn Reconstruction, Apply Math. Physics and Dynamics in Traffic Accident Reconstruction., Understanding Vehicle Collision Behavior, Perception & Reaction in Traffic Accident, Principle of Momnetum、 Work and Energy、 Speed Estimates for Vehicle, Steering Over-correction in Traffic Accident, Vehicle-Pedestrian, Motorcycle and Heavy Truck Traffic Accident Reconstruction。

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本門課內容包括以下﹕能量與動力原理，燃料與燃燒簡介，鍋爐與熱交換器簡介，渦輪機與內燃機，核能與水力發電動力廠
description.en: This course is an introduction to the following topics﹔principles of energy and power, fuels and combustion, boiler and heat exchanger, turbine and internal combustion systems, nuclear and hydraulic power plants.

description.zh: 指導學生進行研究專題，以培育其研發能力。每一位學生必須經指導教授選定題目，獨立或數位同學成一組完成硬體或軟體專題，並書寫印製，經系公開展示與評分。
description.en: Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instructions to select the topics of special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.

description.zh: 本課程著重冷凍系統和空調系統能源的分析，探討構成系統的主要元件－壓縮機、蒸發器和冷凝器的耗能，和各泵、冰水盤管、空調箱及風／水管路系統的能源耗損，進而對整個系統運轉時的效率予以檢討。最後提出各種改善方法，節約能源和減少電力契約容量的技術，以使學生具有節能省電的正確理論觀念和實務技術。
description.en:
This lesson is focused on the energy analyses of refrigeration systems and air-conditioning systems. The operating defects of compressors, evaporators and
condensers are to be investigated. Also the energy consumption's of pumps, fan coils air-handling units and duct/water systems are studied. The over all performance of the entire system is thus discussed. Several methods to improve the shortages and the techniques to energy conservation and electricity demand cut-down will be proposed.
The students should understand correctly the theory of energy conservation and the
technology to improve the systems.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
本課程旨在發展學生獨立規劃及從事研究的能力，學生可在指導老師的指導下，依個別的需求選擇研究的方向，訂定題目，並獨立完成研究計畫，撰寫報告。
專題研究範圍含：
 實驗研究
 量調查研究或質調查研究
 個案研究
 回溯研究
 文化比較研究
 理論闡述研究
本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.zh: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
description.en: This course aims to strengthen students' oral expression and communicative abilities in English, broaden knowledge and international views. The course is designed to train the students gradually by using the techniques of Consecutive Interpretation, which starts from short sentences and paragraphs and leads to longer passages. For example, the techniques in sight translation, note-taking and various simulation drills are intensely practiced in class. It ranges from commercial & trade, banking affairs, current events, technologies and production.

description.zh: 引導學生瞭解如何根據不同對象、不同場合、不同時間、不同情境，貼切地使用英語，也概括介紹分析語言溝通所需的概念與工具。
description.en: This course is concerned with how speakers organize what they want to say in accordance with who they are talking to, where, when, and under what circumstances. It offers a broad overview of the concepts and tools that are required for analyzing how linguistic communication works.

description.zh: 探討印刷媒體（報紙、雜誌）、放映性媒體與電子媒體（Facebook、Blog）之特性，及英文在各類媒體應用之道；培養學生科技、商業、及教學媒體之賞析與應用能力。
description.en: This course is designed to help explore some of the important properties of the media: printing press , projective and electronic as well as the applied approaches of English in diverse media. The ability to enjoy and apply various types of media, including those on technology, business or teaching is among the course objectives.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解策略管理的意義及其演進, 如何建立公司策略以增加之競爭力。課程主要內容包括：1.策略管理的意義, 2.企業內外在環境分析, 3.策略制定, 4.策略執行與評估, 5.事業階層策略, 6.公司策略, 7.購併。
description.en: The objective of the course is to establish a set of frameworks for the formulation and implementation of strategy. Topics of the course include SWOT, strategy formulation, strategy implementation, business-level strategy, corporate-level strategy, and merger & acquisition.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。溝通是人際關係中重要的手段，本課程提供學生對溝通知識的了解，並熟悉溝通的實務運用。課程重心涵蓋溝通的本質與觀念性架構，溝通的理論與模型，溝通的規劃、執行與控制，溝通的策略與技能。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion. It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development. The course discuss about the communication issue from business manager. It introduces the concepts of communication and the practice about communication. The core of the course include the knowledge of communication and structure、theory and models.

description.zh: 從企業CEO或經理人的觀點來操研討論國際商務談判的有關問題，旨在提供學生對國際性談判認識的了解，並熟悉談判的實務運用。課程重心涵蓋談判的本質與觀念性架構，談判的理論與模型，談判的規劃、執行與控制，談判的策略與技能。上課方式操研討論為主，並操分組報告與討論。
description.en: The viewpoint of business manager and CEO focus into the issues of International Negotiation. The objectives of this course are to provide understanding some of the core concepts of the negotiation and to acquaint application approach of the practice. The negotiation topics cover: (1) nature, conceptual, framework, theory and model and (2) to analyze, plan, strategy, tactics, and implement successful negotiation. This can povide groups discussion and improve speaking skills.

description.zh: 本課程從全球化觀念來探討品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以全新研究的品牌理論來探討全球品牌的重要關鍵議題，其中包括全球品牌與公司策略的關係與整合、整合品牌概念、新經濟時代的品牌觀念與全球營運模式、整合品牌的執行與評估。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of global branding as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, profits and non-profit organizations, domestic and global companies, and small and large business. Global Branding Management builds on Global branding Strategy, focusing on the major tactics and tools used by international marketers in managing their global marketing plans.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程由老師指導學生選定題目，進行該題目之問題定義、分析、設計與製作。專題完成後需撰寫書面報告並公開展示成品。專題範圍包含：1.多媒體系統 2.電腦網路 3.軟體分析與設計4.影像與音訊處理 5.微算機應用
description.en: In this course, the instructor will guide the students to fulfill a special project through the phases of problem formulation, analysis, design and implementation. The final work should be demonstrated in the public along with a written report. The topics include 1.Multimedia systems 2.Computer networks 3.Software analysis and design 4.Audio and video signal processing 5.Microprocessor-based applications

description.zh: 本課程目標旨在介紹學生軟體工程的概念，並瞭解相關的技術與應用。學生將會學習，開發一個高品質軟體所需要的軟體工程原理、觀念、方法、技術、與步驟。本課程將介紹下列主題：專案流程、專案管理與規劃、.系統需求分析、系統設計方法、系統測試與驗證、系統維護方法等。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with a better knowledge and skills in software engineering. In particular, students will learn about the principles, concepts, methods, and techniques of the software engineering approach to producing quality software. The course covers the subjects on software process models, project management and planning, software requirement specifications and analysis models, software design methods, software verification and validation techniques, and software maintenance.

description.zh: 1.數位視訊的表示法 2.畫面內編碼 3.JPEC與JPEG2000 4.動作補償與畫面間編碼 5.視訊傳輸之漸進式編碼與強健性 6.合成影像之編碼 7.多媒體資料索引與檢索8.智慧財產權的保護：浮水印與其他９. MPEG標準
description.en: 1.Representations of Digital Video 2.Intraframe Coding 3.JPEG and JPEG 2000Standards 4.Motion Compensation and Interframe Coding 5.Content-BasedScalability and Robustness of Video Transmission 6.Coding of Synthetic Video 7.Multimedia Indexing and Retrieval 8.IP Protection Techniques:watermarking and others 9.MPEG Standards

description.zh: 智慧型代理人系統技術結合人工智慧、分散式計算與網際網路技術，逐漸成為未來重要的資訊技術。本課程介紹智慧型代理人系統之理論、架構與應用。學生透過此課程實做一個智慧型代理人系統，以瞭解代理人技術與應用。課程主要內容包括 - 1.多代理人理論與架構，2. 機器學習與代理人調適，3. 協調技術，4. 合作與競爭，5.賽局理論與決策，6.知識本體論， 7.網路服務。本課程包含機率與隨機程序的基礎原理,如機率量測,隨機變數,大數法則,隨機程序,穩態隨機程序及其特性。本門課程為研究所在通訊及控制組之基本課程。
description.en: Intelligent agents integrate artificial intelligence, network, distributed computing and web technology. This course introduces the state of the art of intelligent agents, its theories, languages, architectures and applications. Students can learn from the course the basic concepts and understanding of agent system through the course. The content includes the intelligent agents about - 1.Fundamental theories and architectures, 2. Machine learning and adaptive agents, 3.Negotiation and coordination, 4 Cooperative and competitive problem solving, 5. Game theories and decision making, 6. Ontology and knowledge sharing, 7.Semantic web and web services.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至資訊相關機構連續實習18週，每週不得低於2.5天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at a computer science (information engineering) related company or research organizations for 18 weeks(20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

notes: 部份時間(2.5天/週)，加選前須先完成廠商媒合簽約

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 指導學生進行研究專題，以培其實務的能力，學生必須選一實務專題，由本系教師指導，在畢業前完成成品製作，且需有書面報告。
description.en: Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers.Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instrution's to select the topics of special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or sofetware and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.

notes: 須先修過實務專題(二)，及繳交指導教授同意書始得修習

description.zh: 探討PN接面之特性，短通道效應，表通道技術原理，費米能階等基本元件物理，及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micre CMOS device,characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative hpysical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

notes: 四光四與光電所合開，億光1035

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.視覺與色彩 3.陰極射線管顯示器 4.電漿顯示器 5.液晶顯示器 6.電致發光顯示器 7.場發射顯示器 8.有機發光顯示器
description.en: 1.Introduction 2.Sight and color 3.Cathode-ray tube(CRT) 4.Plasma panel display(PDP) 5.Liquid crystal display(LCD) 6.Electrolumisence display(ELP) 7.Field emission display(FED) 8.Organic light emitting device(OLED)

notes: 四光四與光電所合開，億光1035

name.en: Design and application of optical coating

description.zh: (1)基本理論(2)光學薄膜設計之圖示法(3)分光鏡(4)高反射鏡(5) 截止濾光片(6)帶通濾光片(7)斜向入射薄膜
description.en: (1)Basic theory (2)Admittance diagrams for optical coating design(3)Beam splitter(4)High reflection coating(5)Edge filter(6)Band-pass filter(7)Tilted coatings

notes: 四光四與光電所合開，億光935

name.zh: 液晶顯示器驅動電子學

description.zh: 1.液晶材料的種類 2.液晶物理特性 3. 液晶顯示模式4. 薄膜電晶體元件物理4. 薄膜電晶體操作特性 5. 像素的結構及佈局 7. 顯示器的等效電路模型8. 顯示器驅動原理 9. 響應時間的驅動補償
description.en: 1. Types of liquid crystals  2. Physics of liquid crystals  3. Display modes and electro-optical properties  4. Properties of a-Si Thin film transistors  5. Operation of TFTs  6. Layouts of pixels with TFT switches  7. Circuit model of LCDs  8. Addressing of LCDs  9. Driving compensation for response time

notes: 四光四與光電所合開，億光1035

description.zh: 1. 太陽能電池工作原理，2. 半導體材料與模型，3. 理想轉換效率，4. 單晶矽太陽能電池，5. 薄膜太陽能電池，6. 太空與聚光太陽能電池，7. 有機與敏染太陽能電池。
description.en: 1 Principles of Solar Cells Operation, 2. Semiconductor Material and Modeling, 3. Ideal Conversion Efficiency, 4. Crystalline Silicon Solar Cels, 5. Thin Film Solar Cell Technology, 6. Space and Concentrator Cells, 7. Organic and Dye Sensitised Cells.

notes: 四光四與光電所合開，億光1035

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: N
description.en: N

description.zh: 公共藝術涉題人文、藝術、空間、社會、設計等領域，本課程藉由介紹台灣及世界各地之公共藝術發展，推廣公共藝術的整體概念，使學子了解公共藝術的重要性，也藉此培養學生的專業知能、人文素養及藝術鑑賞能力。
description.en: The public art involves the humanities, arts, spatial, social, and design fields, this course introduces the development of the public art in Taiwan and the world to promote the whole concept of public art, so that students can understand the importance of the public art, but also to take this training the student's professional knowledge, humanities, and arts appreciation.

description.zh: 中文課程共分四年三階段授課。 第一年以華語教學為主，授課重點為：（一）華語基本句型句法；（二）華語基本會話；（三）生活語言；（四）標音系統。 第二、第三年，除延續第一年華語授課重點外，以段落朗讀和基本認字為主要訓練，並給與中國文字書寫訓練。 第四年，加強會話能力，認字與閱讀能力，並傳授中國文化。
description.en: The course of Chinese is categorized as three individual stages for four years. In the first year, the course focuses on : (a) Basic Sentence Patterns, (b) Basic Conversation, (c) Languages in the Real Life and (d) the phonetic system for the Chinese language. In the second and the third year, the training focuses on paragraph reading and term/character recognition-in addition to the teaching themes set in the first year. Writing courses are also added during this stage. In the fourth year, we add more emphasis on the conversational ability, term/character recognition and reading ability. More culture-related information will be included.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 同CE401所述。
使學者了解水利工程實務及水利工程設計之基本原則。課程內容概要：(1)水利工程概述、(2)環境衝擊與相關法規、(3)重大水利建設實例說明(投影片、幻燈片、錄影帶)、(4)水土保持工程、(5)治河與防洪工程、(6)水文設計、(7)其它。
description.en: This course is stressed in an understanding of parts of fundamental hydraulic and its applications of water resources engineering.The outlines are as follows:Introduction,Environmental impact and Water law,Fundamental hydraulic,model similitude,Soil conservation,Flood control,Dams,The"three Gorges of the Yangtze River",...etc.

description.zh: 結構設計之原則及理念,載重與阻抗因子設計法(LRFD)之觀念與理論,鋼結構之型式及材料,拉力構件,壓力構件,梁,梁柱,接合之設計.
description.en: Principles and philosophies of structural design,concepts and theories load and resistance factoe design. typs and materials for steel structures. tension member. Compresion members,beams,beam-columns,connections.

description.zh:
本課程的內容係針對目前在大地工程界的基礎工程施工實務為主軸依序介紹給學生:
1.地質粘探與判識      2.地質與土壤的分類與力學參數的評估
3.地下連續壁施工      4.基樁(全套管及無套管工法)施工
5.基礎開挖(順打工法及逆打工法) 6.安全支撐系統(型鋼或地錨工法)
7.基樁或地錨載重試驗  8.安全監測系統.
description.en:
The instruction material covers the up-to-date construction
technology of foundation engineering,such as:subsurface ivestigation,soil classification,evaluation of mechanical properties,slurry wall construction,foundation excavation....etc.

description.zh:
這是專門為甘比亞土木專班而設計的課程，課程內容特別考量甘比亞的國情，強調水利工程、河流及環境相關課程，並以學生需求為導向，以便為受訓學生提供最好的教育，培養甘比亞未來的土木工程師。課程所考量的客觀資料如下：

1. 甘國位於非洲西部，面積10,380平方公里，海岸線長48公里
2. 全境為一東西方向狹長平原，切入塞內加爾共和國境內
3. 主要河流為甘比亞河，甘國國土主要沿甘比亞河分佈
4. 首都班竹市，人口約52萬人，全國約一百三十萬人
5. 農業生產約占國民生產毛額的五分之三
6. 主要以花生的生產為基礎，花生的輸出占國內輸出的五分之四
7. 據1998年之調查顯示，33%之都市居民及54%之鄉村居民生活在貧窮線下
8. 成人識字率不足40%
9. 國民平均壽命約為53歲
description.en: This is a course designed for Gambia Civil Engineering Class. Under special consideration of the situation in the country and the needs from the country, the course content emphasized on hydraulic engineering, river work and environment and training the students to become future civil engineer for Gambia.

description.zh: 這門課程將介紹西方建築的主要潮流和時期，包括希臘羅馬建築、中世紀建築、文藝復興時期、巴洛克建築、19世紀工業革命主義時期和20世紀現代主義思潮。課程中將會完整地介紹每一時期的建築特色，然後再特別針對每一時期所運用到的建築學理加以舉例說明，例如對稱學、物理學、數學、視神經學…等等。
description.en: This class will introduce the principle movements of Occidental architectures that are:  Greek and Roman architecture, Middle ages architecture, Renaissance, Baroque architecture, 19th Century industrialism, 20th Century Modern movements. For each period the class will introduce it in general and then focus more specifically on the use of sciences in those architectures like geometry, physics, mathematics, optic.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎西班牙語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。培養學生簡易西文的溝通能力，提供學生西文的基礎知識(包括字母、讀音、語法等)，並增進學生對西班牙文化的認識與興趣。本課程分為(一)和(二)兩部分進行(各三學分)。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Spanish abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Spanish language. By keeping their interests in studying Spanish, students are expected to have basic communicational skill, basic knowledge of Spanish language (including alphabet, phonetic and grammar) and better understanding of Spanish culture. The course is divided into two parts: Part 1 (Fall Semester), Part 2 (Spring Semester), three credits involved in each semester.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
1. 94學年度起之大學部入學新生擬修習「英文實務」課程說明：學生修習「英文實務」課程，必須參加全民英檢中級初試， 其中「聽力 測驗」及「閱讀測驗」兩項成績合計達80分以上，始得修習此課程，修課學生請持「全民英檢中級初試成績單正本及影本至」教務處註冊組登錄。）
2. 為考量同學因個人生涯規劃，若參加「全民英檢」以外的英語檢定考試，例如適用於全球職場英文能力統一標準之TOEIC測驗及教育部所規定採計之其他英檢考試等。其考試成績如對應符合CEF B1級（全民英檢中級）以上者，免修英文實務。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(五)

description.zh: 「國際情勢」單元，主要論述區域安全與兩岸情勢發展，並介紹武裝衝突法的內涵與意義，培育學生宏觀的國際視野；更進一步說明在全球化浪潮下，國際重要的安全議題及我國的因應之道，以提升憂患意識，強化全民國防共識。軍事訓練課目：敵情教育及兩岸情勢、機艦與人員識別、保防教育、武裝衝突法及日內瓦公約、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。
description.en:
In International Situations, the object is to cultivate students’ broader international perspectives through discussing Asian-Pacific regional security and the development of cross-strait relation and introducing the meaning and content of Law of Armed Conflict. The other object is to enhance their consciousness of crisis and strengthen their consensus of all-out defense by informing students about important international security issues under globalization and the nation’s responses..
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Education for Enemy Information and Cross-Strait Situation, Identification of Planes, Ships as well as Personnel, Internal Security Education, Law of Armed Conflict and Geneva Conventions, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

notes: 停開，請改加選有開課班級【停開】

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012或負責教授同意。介紹各種不同方法分析(如能量法及Castigliano定理)、破壞理論、材料選用、可靠度概念、軸及軸承、離合器及煞車器、傳動元件(如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)、軸聯接器、飛輪、彈簧等以及實例分析。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods(Energy method & Castigliano theorem ), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains and Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs and analysis of expansions.

description.zh: (A)熱工實驗：能量轉換、熱之傳遞、對流及輻射、熱交換器、燃燒及燃料等之實驗。(B) 流力實驗：雷諾數實驗、管路摩擦實驗(損失係數)、管路能量損失實驗(90°彎管、小半徑彎管、大半徑彎管、突擴、突縮)、文氏管流量實驗、孔口板流量實驗、壓力量測實驗、堰流量實驗、pump性能曲線實驗、壓力中心實驗、風洞實驗(升力、阻力係數)。
description.en:
(A) Thermal Lab.

Thermal experiments include energy transformation, heat conduction, convection, and radiation, heat exchanger, combustion, etc. 

(B) Fluid Mechanics Lab.

Reynolds’s Number test, Pipe friction test (loss coefficient), Pipe energy loss test (90°miter, elbow, sudden enlargement and contraction), Venturi meter flow measurement, Orifice flow measurement, Pressure measurement, Wear flow measurement, Pump performance test, Pressure center test, Wind tunnel experiments (lift and drag coefficient).

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、物理系統的數學模式、控制器的種類、時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析、控制系統的設計、Z 轉換、數位控制、電腦控制之介面及程式、現代控制理論與簡介。實習項目：MATLAB介紹與應用、暫態響應、PID 控制的影響、Lead-Lag控制的影響、頻率響應、系統判別、控制器設計。
description.en:
Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System, Z-Transform, Digital Control, Interface and Programming
of Computer Control, Theory and Introduction of Modern Control. Lab:Introduction and Application of MATLAB, Transient Response, Effect of PID Control, Effect of Lead-Lag Control, Frequency Response, System Identification, and Controller Design.

notes: 一般教室  綜科327，限60人

description.zh: CAD套裝軟體介紹、CAD數值技巧、二維畫圖、三維畫圖、曲面模型、實體模型建立、動畫之製作、最佳化設計、整合性之CAD系統及專題。
description.en: Introduction of CAD software package. Review of Numerical technique for CAD.2-D Graphics, 3-D Graphics, surface modeling, solid modeling. Design optimization, Integrated CAD systems and Animation project.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002013或負責教授同意。簡易連桿組之合成（圖解法與解析法）、耦曲線在設計上之應用、同耦曲線族、機構之靜力與動力分析、轉子之平衡、機構之平衡、飛輪設計、引擎動力學與平衡、凸輪動力學、臨界轉速、球面與空間連桿組之簡介。
description.en: Synthesis of Four-bar linkage (Graphical and Analytical Method) , Application of Coupler careers in Design , coupler cognate Mechanisms static and dynamic analysis of Mechanisms. Balancing Rotating Masses, Flywheels, Balancing Reciprocating Masses, dynamics of Cams, critical Whirling speeds, Introduction of spherical and spatial linkages.

description.zh: 本課程介紹基本的金屬切削原理及其實務應用。本課程包含以下各項主題：(1)工具機與加工操作，(2)基本切削力學，(3)金屬切削溫度，(4)刀具壽命與刀具材料，(5)切削液與切削表面粗度，(6)金屬切削操作經濟學，(7)切屑控制，(8)研磨加工，(9)金屬切削實驗方法，(10)CAD/CAM與數控加工，(11)精密切削技術等。
description.en: This course is an introduction to basic metal-cutting principles and their practical applications. This course includes the following topics: (1) machine tools and machining operations, (2) fundamental metal-cutting mechanics, (3) temperature effect in metal machining, (4) tool lifetime and tool materials, (5) cutting coolants and surface roughness, (6) economics of meta-cutting operations, (7) chip control, (8) grinding, (9) experimental methods on metal machining, (10) CAD/CAM and numerical control (NC) machining, (11) techniques for precision machining.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(五)

description.zh: 「國際情勢」單元，主要論述區域安全與兩岸情勢發展，並介紹武裝衝突法的內涵與意義，培育學生宏觀的國際視野；更進一步說明在全球化浪潮下，國際重要的安全議題及我國的因應之道，以提升憂患意識，強化全民國防共識。軍事訓練課目：敵情教育及兩岸情勢、機艦與人員識別、保防教育、武裝衝突法及日內瓦公約、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。
description.en:
In International Situations, the object is to cultivate students’ broader international perspectives through discussing Asian-Pacific regional security and the development of cross-strait relation and introducing the meaning and content of Law of Armed Conflict. The other object is to enhance their consciousness of crisis and strengthen their consensus of all-out defense by informing students about important international security issues under globalization and the nation’s responses..
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Education for Enemy Information and Cross-Strait Situation, Identification of Planes, Ships as well as Personnel, Internal Security Education, Law of Armed Conflict and Geneva Conventions, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

notes: 停開，請改加選有開課班級【停開】

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012或負責教授同意。介紹各種不同方法分析(如能量法及Castigliano定理)、破壞理論、材料選用、可靠度概念、軸及軸承、離合器及煞車器、傳動元件(如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)、軸聯接器、飛輪、彈簧等以及實例分析。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods(Energy method & Castigliano theorem ), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains and Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs and analysis of expansions.

description.zh: (A)熱工實驗：能量轉換、熱之傳遞、對流及輻射、熱交換器、燃燒及燃料等之實驗。(B) 流力實驗：雷諾數實驗、管路摩擦實驗(損失係數)、管路能量損失實驗(90°彎管、小半徑彎管、大半徑彎管、突擴、突縮)、文氏管流量實驗、孔口板流量實驗、壓力量測實驗、堰流量實驗、pump性能曲線實驗、壓力中心實驗、風洞實驗(升力、阻力係數)。
description.en:
(A) Thermal Lab.

Thermal experiments include energy transformation, heat conduction, convection, and radiation, heat exchanger, combustion, etc. 

(B) Fluid Mechanics Lab.

Reynolds’s Number test, Pipe friction test (loss coefficient), Pipe energy loss test (90°miter, elbow, sudden enlargement and contraction), Venturi meter flow measurement, Orifice flow measurement, Pressure measurement, Wear flow measurement, Pump performance test, Pressure center test, Wind tunnel experiments (lift and drag coefficient).

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。以C語言為主的計算機應用程式設計，得包含：人機界面程式、即時多工程式、輸出入界面程式、多媒體程式、通訊及網路程式。
description.en: Computer programming using C language: programming of human-machine interface, real-time multi-task programming, input/output interface programming, multimedia programming, communicational and network programming.

notes: 機械三乙與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、物理系統的數學模式、控制器的種類、時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析、控制系統的設計、Z 轉換、數位控制、電腦控制之介面及程式、現代控制理論與簡介。實習項目：MATLAB介紹與應用、暫態響應、PID 控制的影響、Lead-Lag控制的影響、頻率響應、系統判別、控制器設計。
description.en:
Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System, Z-Transform, Digital Control, Interface and Programming
of Computer Control, Theory and Introduction of Modern Control. Lab:Introduction and Application of MATLAB, Transient Response, Effect of PID Control, Effect of Lead-Lag Control, Frequency Response, System Identification, and Controller Design.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002013或負責教授同意。簡易連桿組之合成（圖解法與解析法）、耦曲線在設計上之應用、同耦曲線族、機構之靜力與動力分析、轉子之平衡、機構之平衡、飛輪設計、引擎動力學與平衡、凸輪動力學、臨界轉速、球面與空間連桿組之簡介。
description.en: Synthesis of Four-bar linkage (Graphical and Analytical Method) , Application of Coupler careers in Design , coupler cognate Mechanisms static and dynamic analysis of Mechanisms. Balancing Rotating Masses, Flywheels, Balancing Reciprocating Masses, dynamics of Cams, critical Whirling speeds, Introduction of spherical and spatial linkages.

description.zh: 自動化機構運動及動力分析、控制理論與氣液壓學簡介、機構元件說明、馬達及感測器選用。
description.en:
Kinematic and dynamic Analysis of automatic mechanisms, Control theorem, Introduction to pneumatics and Hydraulics,
Mechanism elements, Selection of motors and sensors.

description.zh:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
  數位系統簡介，數字系統及編碼，基本邏輯操作，數位積體電路設計，布氏代數與卡諾圖，組合電路設計與應用，正反器，暫存器，順序電路設計與應用，計數器與計時器，多工器與解多工器，記憶體，微處理機架構簡介。
description.en:
Introduction to Digital Circuits, Digital Systems and Coding, Basic Logic Operations,
  Boolean Algebra and K-Map, Combinational Logic Circuits, Flip-Flop, Register, Sequential Circuit Design and Applications, Counter
  and Timer, Multiplexer and Demultiplexer, Shit Register and Memory, Introduction to Micro-processor.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
1. 94學年度起之大學部入學新生擬修習「英文實務」課程說明：學生修習「英文實務」課程，必須參加全民英檢中級初試， 其中「聽力 測驗」及「閱讀測驗」兩項成績合計達80分以上，始得修習此課程，修課學生請持「全民英檢中級初試成績單正本及影本至」教務處註冊組登錄。）
2. 為考量同學因個人生涯規劃，若參加「全民英檢」以外的英語檢定考試，例如適用於全球職場英文能力統一標準之TOEIC測驗及教育部所規定採計之其他英檢考試等。其考試成績如對應符合CEF B1級（全民英檢中級）以上者，免修英文實務。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。

description.en:
In International Situations, the object is to cultivate students’ broader international perspectives through discussing Asian-Pacific regional security and the development of cross-strait relation and introducing the meaning and content of Law of Armed Conflict. The other object is to enhance their consciousness of crisis and strengthen their consensus of all-out defense by informing students about important international security issues under globalization and the nation’s responses..
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Education for Enemy Information and Cross-Strait Situation, Identification of Planes, Ships as well as Personnel, Internal Security Education, Law of Armed Conflict and Geneva Conventions, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

notes: 停開，請改加選有開課班級【停開】

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹運轉中的機械系統其各部零件在運動必須遵守的準則及力在零件間的傳遞。範例含連桿組、凸輪、齒輪、純滾動系統、鏈輪、皮帶、滾筒式傳動組等的介紹。
description.en:
Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor
Introduction of the principles that all the members of a mechanical system have to obey in motion as well as the forces transmitted between the members. Examples include linkages, cams, gears, pure rolling systems, chain drives, belt drives, friction drives, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。物質熱力學特性、改變能量形式之基本原理、熱力學第一及第二定律、可逆性與可用性、動力循環、冷凍循環、混合氣、化學反應。
description.en:
Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor
Thermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, and Chemical Reactions.

description.zh: 先修課程：物理或負責教授同意。不可壓縮流體、質量不滅、非黏性流體之運動、柏努力定律、線性及角動量定理及其應用、渦流與勢流、黏性流、納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及應用、管中壓力頭損失及增加、邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
description.en: Incompressible fluid, mass conservation, invoiced flow, Bernoulli principle, linear, angular momentum conservation and application, vortex, and potential flow, Navier-Stoke equation, pressure loss, boundary layer flow, separation flow, lift and drag, Reynold analogy and applications.

description.zh:
先修課程：負責教授同意。(A)材料試驗：學習金相試片的準備及光學顯微鏡之觀察、材料顯微結構的認識、各種機械性質的試驗。(B)
固力實驗：(1)一般性實驗：樑的撓度試驗、圓桿扭轉實驗；(2)振動實驗：質量－阻尼－彈簧系統實驗(MCK)、樑之共振頻率實驗、軸之臨界轉速實驗；(3)應力分析實驗：應變計實驗、光彈性實驗；(4)動態量測實驗：機械振動性質測定實驗、動平衡實驗、工具機切削力測定實驗。
description.en: (A) Materials testing: metallographic test, optical microscopes, microscopic structure, and mechanical property. (B) Solid mechanics testing: (1) testing of deflection of beams, testing of a twisted circular shaft; (2) testing of vibration : mass-damping spring system, testing of resonance frequency, testing of critical speed on shaft. (3) testing of stress analysis : strain gage, photo-elasticity  (4) testing of dynamic measurement, the property of mechanical vibration dynamic balance, and cutting resistance on machine tool.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、物理系統的數學模式、控制器的種類、時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析、控制系統的設計、Z 轉換、數位控制、電腦控制之介面及程式、現代控制理論與簡介。
description.en: Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System, Z-Transform, Digital Control, Interface and Programming of Computer Control, Theory and Introduction of Modern Control.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(五)

description.zh: 「國際情勢」單元，主要論述區域安全與兩岸情勢發展，並介紹武裝衝突法的內涵與意義，培育學生宏觀的國際視野；更進一步說明在全球化浪潮下，國際重要的安全議題及我國的因應之道，以提升憂患意識，強化全民國防共識。軍事訓練課目：敵情教育及兩岸情勢、機艦與人員識別、保防教育、武裝衝突法及日內瓦公約、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。
description.en:
In International Situations, the object is to cultivate students’ broader international perspectives through discussing Asian-Pacific regional security and the development of cross-strait relation and introducing the meaning and content of Law of Armed Conflict. The other object is to enhance their consciousness of crisis and strengthen their consensus of all-out defense by informing students about important international security issues under globalization and the nation’s responses..
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Education for Enemy Information and Cross-Strait Situation, Identification of Planes, Ships as well as Personnel, Internal Security Education, Law of Armed Conflict and Geneva Conventions, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

notes: 停開，請改加選有開課班級【停開】

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解信號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為控制，通訊，電子電路，濾波器設計及數位信號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1)標準訊號及訊號表示法 (2)連續系統的數學分析 (3)離散系統的數學分析 (4)拉氏轉換分析 (5)Z-轉換分析 (6)傅立葉分析 (7)工程應用。
description.en:
course title : signals and systems
description : this course contains the properties of signals , systems , LTI systems , and basis linear transforms . this is a basic course in the field of control and communication .

Course Title:Microprocessor
Description:This course introduces the working principles of computer.
It puts emphasis on both hardware and software, as well as both theory
and appplication. Basically, this course covers the introduction of
general microprocessors:their architecture and operation, Assembly
language program and module program, instruction addressing mode,
instruction operation, and I/O Program and interface. More
specifically, multi-programming configuration and multi-processing
configuration are also discussed here. New topics will be added if
needed.

description.zh: 通論，基本理論，傳輸線參數，傳輸線的數學模式，變壓器的數學模式及標么值系統，對稱成分，對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，負載潮流分析與控制，電力系統之經濟運轉，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力控制系統，系統保護。
description.en: Introduction, Basic principles, Transmission line parameters, Line model, power flow analysis, optimal dispatch of generation

description.zh: 探討各種電機特性及工作原理，內容包含：(1)磁路分析(2)電機-機械能量轉換 (3)繞組及氣隙磁動勢 (4)繞組電感及電壓方程式 (5)繞組因數 (6)直流機 (7)感應機 (8)同步機。
description.en:
Course Title:Electric Machinery
Description:Principles, Construction and Application of transformer,
DC motors, DC generators, induction motors, induction generators,
synchronous motors and synchronous generators.

description.zh: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。
description.en:
1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic
2.VLSI realizations of combination logic
3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.
4.Components of sequential systems
5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.

description.zh: (1)作業系統簡介 (2)工作觀念之介紹：異步及平行程式處理(3)記憶體管理：實際及虛擬記憶體之管理 (4)處理機管理：工作排序及多元處理 (5)輔助儲存體之管理：磁碟排序，檔案及資料庫 (6)網路作業系統及安全性(含分散式資料處理)(7)範例研究：DOS，UNIX Windows NT。
description.en:
1.History and evolution 

2.Process concepts

3.ASynchronous concurrent processes

4.Desdlock and indefinite postponrmrnt

5.Real storage management

6.Virtual storage organization and management 

7.Processor scheduling 

8.Disk mansgement

9.Network and security

notes: 四電三甲乙丙合開,電腦教室，限80人

description.zh: 半導體開關在電力電子電路之作用，波形失真與諧波分析,DC-DC轉換器，AC-DC轉換器，DC-AC轉換器。
description.en:
1.power semiconductor switches. 2.waveform distortion
  & harmonic analysis. 3.DC-DC converter. 4.AC-DC converter. 5.DC-AC converter.

description.zh: 簡介，二極體電路，雙極性電晶體電路，低頻小信號放大器，場效電晶體電路，功率放大器，回授放大器，差動放大器，多級放大器，運算放大器，頻率響應分析與設計，振盪器及濾波器分析與設計，固態半導體理論。
description.en:
Course Title:Linear Electronics
Description:This course is to study the characteristics of the
semiconductor devices and design of the electronic circuits.

notes: 四電三甲乙丙合開,限80人

description.zh: (1)向量分析 (2)靜電場理論：庫倫，高斯定律，電位能，電場能量與功，介電質電場現象，電容 (3)拉普拉斯方程式，電像法、邊界值問題 (4)靜磁場理論：畢沙瓦特，安培定律，磁位能，磁場能量與功，強磁性材料特性電感 (5)電磁感應與馬克斯威爾方程式。
description.en:
Course Title:Electromagnetism
Description:This is an introductory course of electromagnetic bias on
its Engineering applications. The course is divided into five parts
(1) the static electric field, (2) the steady electric current, (3)
the static magnetic field, (4) the quari-stationary electromagnetic
field and, (5) Maxwell equations and their applications.
Besides, the course also introduces some of the optical technology.
